$note: Many dependencies (enet, zlib, spng, astronomy, centijson, ffmpeg, openal, luajit, miniupnpc, libnatpmp) are NOT managed by vcpkg in this project. They are downloaded as prebuilt binaries from https://github.com/dkfans/kfx-deps by deps/CMakeLists.txt. This is due to custom build configurations and platform-specific requirements. To use vcpkg-managed versions, significant refactoring would be required.
